item.title: The 2024 Tech Forecast: Pioneering Tech Redefining Our World
item.description: I’m diving into 2024 with eyes wide open for the tech that’s got me buzzing. This isn’t just any tech roundup; it’s a personal tour through the innovations that I’m stoked about â€“ the stuff that’s pushing boundaries and shaping what’s next. Whether it’s the latest in AI, the next leap in space tech, or health innovations that are changing the game, I’m here to share my take on what these advancements mean for us and the world.

item.title: The Hidden Dangers of IoT: Shadow Devices
item.description: Ah, the Internet of Things (IoT)! A realm where your fridge chats with your grocery store and traffic lights gossip with GPS systems to streamline your commute. But lurking behind these conveniences is a less talked about, somewhat sneaky phenomenon: The Shadow IoT. As someone who’s spent decades probing, testing, and sometimes breaking into systems (ethically, of course), I’ve seen firsthand how the rapid proliferation of IoT devices has reshaped the cybersecurity landscape.
